text: Bregaglia () is a municipality of the district of Maloja in the canton of Graub√ºnden in Switzerland. It was formed by the 2010 merger of the municipalities of Bondo, Castasegna, Soglio, Stampa and Vicosoprano, all in the Val Bregaglia.
